entities.description: Subject to professional secrecy, prohibiting disclosure of personal or private information accessed in their function. Exclusively install, configure, and set up equipment, software, and IT resources.

entities.name: Comité de Direction (CODIR)
entities.description: Directly responsible for Information Systems Security.

entities.name: Information Systems Security
entities.description: Ensured by IT service under direct responsibility of CODIR.

entities.name: IT resources
entities.description: Includes communication tools, Internet, messaging, workstations, equipment, software, office PCs, phones, storage resources, network bandwidth. Provided for professional use, with tolerated reasonable private use. Property of SYSTRAN.

entities.name: Communication tools
entities.description: Part of IT resources, provided for professional use.

entities.name: Internet
entities.description: Part of IT resources, allowed for limited private use.

entities.name: Messaging
entities.description: Part of IT resources, allowed for limited private use.

entities.name: Professional data
entities.description: Includes files, mails, images; considered property of SYSTRAN.

entities.name: Equipment
entities.description: Can be replaced or retrieved by SYSTRAN for maintenance, security, or technological evolutions. Installed, configured, and set up by IT administrators.

entities.name: Software
entities.description: Installed, configured, and set up by IT administrators.

entities.name: Professional applications
entities.description: Must not be endangered by private use.

entities.name: Storage resources
entities.description: Excessive use to be avoided during private use.

entities.name: Network bandwidth
entities.description: Excessive use to be avoided during private use.
